description.description: Description of Resource. Note that this attribute can be updated ONLY FOR A CUSTOM RESOURCE.

edition.description: Edition. Note that this attribute can be updated ONLY FOR A CUSTOM RESOURCE.

isPeerReviewed.description: Defines if peer is reviewed. Note that this attribute can be updated ONLY FOR A CUSTOM RESOURCE.

publisherName.description: Publisher. Note that this attribute can be updated ONLY FOR A CUSTOM RESOURCE.

contributors.description: List of contributors. Note that this attribute can be updated ONLY FOR A CUSTOM RESOURCE.

identifiers.description: List of identifiers. Note that this attribute can be updated ONLY FOR A CUSTOM RESOURCE.

name.description: Resource name. Note that this attribute can be updated ONLY FOR A CUSTOM RESOURCE.

publicationType.description: Publication type. Note that this attribute can be updated ONLY FOR A CUSTOM RESOURCE.

subjects.description: List of subjects for a given resource

coverageStatement.description: Coverage statement. Note that this attribute can be updated both for CUSTOM AND MANAGED RESOURCES.

customEmbargoPeriod.description: Custom Embargo Period information. Note that this attribute can be updated both for CUSTOM AND MANAGED RESOURCES.

isSelected.description: Defines if this item is selected. Note that this attribute can be updated both for CUSTOM AND MANAGED RESOURCES.

url.description: URL. Note that this attribute can be updated ONLY FOR A CUSTOM RESOURCE.

visibilityData.description: Visibility data. Note that this attribute can be updated both for CUSTOM AND MANAGED RESOURCES.

customCoverages.description: List of Custom Coverages information. Note that this attribute can be updated both for CUSTOM AND MANAGED RESOURCES.

proxy.description: Proxy.  Note that this attribute can be updated both for CUSTOM AND MANAGED RESOURCES.
